data.name: Left to Rot
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Left to Rot is a first-person psychological horror game.

Explore an atmospheric world, that combines the surreal events and realistic environments, and enjoy a truly terrifying and spine chilling experience.
data.about_the_game:
Left to Rot is a first-person psychological horror game.

Explore an atmospheric world, that combines the surreal events and realistic environments, and enjoy a truly terrifying and spine chilling experience.
data.short_description: Left to Rot: is a first-person psychological horror with a heavy focus on exploration and immersion that will leave your blood running cold. The player must solve puzzles, explore the surroundings and survive. Navigate through unsettling environments and constantly changing rooms.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Romanian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 or AMD Phenom II X4 955
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
  • Additional Notes: Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are NOT officially supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770k or AMD Ryzen 5 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
  • Additional Notes: Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are NOT officially supported.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains blood, flashing lights, loud noises, and jumpscares. Viewer discretion is advised.
